title: Why is it so socially unacceptable for me to be attracted to Inklings.
body:
As a strong independent feminist girl, I should be able to be attracted to Jinx's sexy tentacles without the criticism of the misogynistic league cis human fanbase. I ink I should be able to do so and not be called such profanities like squid lover or "disgustink". As Inklings are simply not Squids, but kids too.

I do _not_ understand what could possibly be so wrong when I see several yordle lovers floating around these boards.

#_Female Inkling power._#
